column5: It's been a while in seem that I didn't see a post from him.

Looks like the last post he ever responded to was on July 18, 2018.The last visit here, where he logged in, was August 23rd, 2018 at 8:41 in the morning.Hopefully, he's okay and just bored with the site. I hate to think of the other reason that he would just drop off the face of the earth.
He's still alive & active on FB.https://www.facebook.com/ronald.colaresi HRG

I spoke with Ron at the Harrisburg show, (Great American Sports Show). He was at the Air Tamarac booth sharing his knowledge of Lake Herbert and others. He's had a few interesting adventures at the lake and is fully involved in other fishing pursuits. It was good to see him.
